messages.title: CONDITION CRITICAL
messages.content: Veronica and Labour will... - Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs. - Guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours. - Guarantee cancer tests and results within one week.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour plans to recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, and ensure cancer tests and results are delivered within one week.
Plans to build homes in the right places with a priority for first-time buyers, and to alleviate the housing crisis with practical solutions.

issues.health: Labour will improve the NHS by recruiting more nurses and GPs, ensuring quicker GP appointments and faster cancer test results.

housing.content: Labour will give priority to local first-time buyers in the new homes we will build, helping the thousands currently priced out of the market to get their first step on the housing ladder.

images.caption: Veronica King with supporters and activists.
